verses.verse: Then I <S%H7725>turned,<s%> and <S%H5375>lifted<s%> up my <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and <S%H7200>looked,<s%> and <S%H2009>behold<s%> a <S%H5774>flying<s%> <S%H4040>roll.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H4100>What<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> you? And I <S%H559>answered,<s%> I <S%H7200>see<s%> a <S%H5774>flying<s%> <S%H4040>roll;<s%> the <S%H753>length<s%> thereof is <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> and the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> thereof <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H520>cubits.<s%>

Then <S%H559>said<s%> he to me, <S%H2063>This<s%> is the <S%H423>curse<s%> that <S%H3318>goes<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H776>earth:<s%> for <S%H3605>every<s%> one that <S%H1589>steals<s%> shall be <S%H5352>cut<s%> off as on <S%H2088>this<s%> side <S%H3644>according<s%> to it; and <S%H3605>every<s%> one that <S%H7650>swears<s%> shall be <S%H5352>cut<s%> off as on that side <S%H3644>according<s%> to it.

I will <S%H3318>bring<s%> it <S%H3318>forth,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> and it shall <S%H935>enter<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H1590>thief,<s%> and <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of him that <S%H7650>swears<s%> <S%H8267>falsely<s%> by my <S%H8034>name:<s%> and it shall <S%H3885>remain<s%> in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of his <S%H1004>house,<s%> and shall <S%H3615>consume<s%> it with the <S%H6086>timber<s%> thereof and the <S%H68>stones<s%> thereof.

Then the <S%H4397>angel<s%> that <S%H1696>talked<s%> with me <S%H3318>went<s%> <S%H3318>forth,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H5375>Lift<s%> up <S%H4994>now<s%> your <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> is <S%H2063>this<s%> that <S%H3318>goes<s%> <S%H3318>forth.<s%>

And I <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> is it? And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2063>This<s%> is an <S%H374>ephah<s%> that <S%H3318>goes<s%> <S%H3318>forth.<s%> He <S%H559>said<s%> moreover, <S%H2063>This<s%> is their <S%H5869>resemblance<s%> through <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

And, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> there was lifted up a <S%H3603>talent<s%> of <S%H5777>lead:<s%> and <S%H2063>this<s%> is a <S%H802>woman<s%> that <S%H3427>sits<s%> in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H374>ephah.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2063>This<s%> is <S%H7564>wickedness.<s%> And he <S%H7993>cast<s%> it <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H374>ephah;<s%> and he <S%H7993>cast<s%> the <S%H68>weight<s%> of <S%H5777>lead<s%> on the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> thereof.

Then <S%H5375>lifted<s%> I up my <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and <S%H7200>looked,<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> there <S%H3318>came<s%> out <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H802>women,<s%> and the <S%H7307>wind<s%> was in their <S%H3671>wings;<s%> for they had <S%H3671>wings<s%> like the <S%H3671>wings<s%> of a <S%H2624>stork:<s%> and they <S%H5375>lifted<s%> up the <S%H374>ephah<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> and the <S%H8064>heaven.<s%>
Then <S%H559>said<s%> I to the <S%H4397>angel<s%> that <S%H1696>talked<s%> with me, <S%H575>Where<s%> do <S%H1992>these<s%> <S%H3212>bear<s%> the <S%H374>ephah?<s%>

And he <S%H559>said<s%> to me, To <S%H1129>build<s%> it an <S%H1004>house<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H8152>Shinar:<s%> and it shall be <S%H3559>established,<s%> and <S%H3240>set<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> on her own <S%H4369>base.<s%>
